sentences.en: “This form of behavior — independence, locomotor capacity, parental care and development — could be similar to the life history of the theropod, ” he said.
sentences.cn: 这种行为——独立、运动力、亲代抚育和成长——可能与兽脚亚目食肉恐龙的生命轨迹类似"，戴尔博士说。

sentences.en: “This form of behavior — independence, locomotor capacity, parental care and development — could be similar to the life history of the theropod,” he said.
sentences.cn: “这种行为形式，不管是独立性、运动能力，还是亲代抚育和发育过程，都与兽脚类恐龙的生活史相似，”他说。

sentences.en: These differences in day range have important locomotor implications.
sentences.cn: 每天觅食范围的差异,与行进模式的演化大有关系.

words.tran_cn: 火车头的；运动的；移动的
